palette._comment: Add a color selection palette to the sidebar inspector and configure a custom CSS variable, i.e, --wp--preset--color--{slug}, which is equivalent to --wp--preset--color--base
palette.name: Base

palette._comment: Add a color selection palette to the sidebar inspector and configure a custom CSS variable, i.e, --wp--preset--color--{slug}, which is equivalent to --wp--preset--color--default
palette.name: Default

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--primary
palette.name: Primary

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--secondary
palette.name: Secondary

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--quinary
palette.name: Tertiary

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--quaternary
palette.name: Quaternary

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--quinary
palette.name: Quinary

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--accent
palette.name: Accent

palette._comment: add color palette in sidebar inspector & also auto create css variable i.e --wp--preset--color--{slug} = --wp--preset--color--accent-hover
palette.name: Accent Hover
